onyomiExamples.meaning: search (esp. for someone or something missing), manhunt, legally authorized search of a person, building, etc.
search (esp. in criminal investigations), investigation, inquiry, enquiry

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to search for, to look for, to hunt for, to seek, to search (a house, pocket, etc.), to search through, to rummage in (e.g. a drawer), to fish around
